about.title: About LightClip
about.text:
LightClip v1.4 Feature Overview

1. Clipboard Core
- Automatically saves clipboard history with configurable maximum items.
- Records text, images, URLs and file paths copied from the system.
- Allows you to quickly re-copy any previous item from history.
- Pin important items so they are never overwritten by new history.
- Supports image preview (thumbnails shown in the preview area).
- Designed for heavy copy-paste workflows and repetitive tasks.
- Keeps file entries so you can re-copy paths even after moving files.
- Keyword search to quickly filter history.
- Type filter: All / Text / Image / URL / File / Pinned only.
- Clipboard list and preview use 18px fonts with automatic line wrapping.

2. Templates & Hotkeys
- Dedicated "Templates" tab for managing common replies and signatures.
- Add, edit and delete templates freely.
- Bind templates to hotkey index 1–9.
- Global hotkeys Ctrl+Shift+1..9 copy the corresponding template into the clipboard.
- Global hotkey Ctrl+Shift+C toggles the main window.

3. UI & Themes
- Default 18px font size for comfortable long-term use.
- 6 switchable themes:
  1) Dark mode.
  2) Dark reading mode (warm gray).
  3) Dark cyber blue-green style.
  4) Light mode.
  5) Light cream mode.
  6) Cool light mode.
- Themes can be switched at runtime without restarting.
- Settings form row spacing adjusted to 7px for better readability.

4. Languages & Icons
- UI available in Traditional Chinese.
- UI available in English.
- Separate light and dark icon sets to match themes.

5. Storage & Data
- Uses simple JSON files to store settings, history and templates.
- Automatically creates folders and default files on first run.
- Images are stored under data/images and referenced by path.
- Each history entry includes local timestamp and ISO timestamp.

6. System Tray
- System tray icon support.
- Hide window to tray instead of closing the program.
- Tray menu offers "Show Window" and "Quit".

7. Docs & Support
- docs/操作說明.txt: user guide (Chinese).
- docs/更新日誌.txt: changelog.
- "User Guide" button reads docs file and shows it in a dialog.
- "Changelog" button reads docs file and shows it in a dialog.
- "Report Issue" button opens the default browser with a pre-filled email to trialscales0430@gmail.com.

8. Packaging
- Can be built into a single EXE with PyInstaller.
- build_exe.bat helper script for Windows.
- Inno Setup script (build_installer.iss) to create installers.

This is the full feature set of LightClip v1.4.
